Charge::power
static bool power()
Returns true if charging power is present.
Charge::slow
static bool slow()
Returns true if charging slow (ie connected to a USB data port)
Charge::stat
static bool stat()
Returns true if batteries are charging.

Charge API.

Charge::fast
static bool fast()
Returns true if charging fast (ie connected to a USB power adapter)
